name: Voidfall Meteor
description: Fracture has a $s3% chance to grant $m1 $Lstack:stacks; of Voidfall. Upon reaching $1256301u stacks of Voidfall, Soul Cleave consumes a stack to reach into the Void and call down a meteor strike at your target's location, dealing 0 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within $1256306A yards. Damage reduced beyond $s2 targets.

name: Dark Matter
description: Your first Spirit Bomb after entering demon form causes a Shadowflame meteor shower to assault the area, dealing 0 Shadowflame damage over 6 sec.

name: Celestial Echoes
description: $?s263642[Fracture]?a212613[Shear][Consume] generates 5 additional Fury and deals 25% increased damage.

name: Voidfall
description: Fracture has a 0% chance to grant $m1 $Lstack:stacks; of Voidfall. Upon reaching $1256301u stacks of Voidfall, Soul Cleave consumes a stack to reach into the Void and call down a meteor strike at your target's location, dealing 0 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within $1256306A yards. Damage reduced beyond 0 targets.

name: World Killer
description: The third Voidfall meteor strike called down in sequence is larger, has 50% increased area, deals 50% increased damage, and reduces the remaining cooldown of Metamorphosis by 10 sec.

name: Catastrophe
description: Enemies struck by a Voidfall Meteor take an additional 0% damage over 8 sec.

name: Meteor Shower
description: Your first Spirit Bomb after entering demon form causes a Shadowflame meteor shower to assault the area, dealing 0 Shadowflame damage over 0 sec.

name: Meteor Shower
description: Your first Spirit Bomb after entering demon form causes a Shadowflame meteor shower to assault the area, dealing 0 Shadowflame damage over 0 sec.

name: Demon Hunter Vengeance 12.0 Class Set 2pc
description: Fracture damage increased by 35%.

name: Demon Hunter Vengeance 12.0 Class Set 4pc
description: Fracture has a 30% chance to spark a violent detonation, causing 0 Fire damage onto nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

name: Felfire Fist
description: Activating Infernal Strike out of combat or within 5 sec of entering combat places a Sigil of Flame at the target location.

name: Doomsayer
description: Activating Infernal Strike out of combat or within 5 sec of entering combat calls down $s3 Voidfall $LMeteor:Meteors;.

name: Tempered Steel
description: Physical damage increased by 12%.

name: Vengeful Beast
description: Metamorphosis has 5 sec increased duration and increases the damage of Fracture, Soul Cleave, and Spirit Bomb by 20%.

name: Soul Barrier
description: Spirit Bomb shields you for 10 sec, absorbing ${$MHP*$s1/100} damage plus ${$MHP*$s2/100} for each Soul Fragment consumed.

name: Focused Ire
description: The primary target of $?c3[Void Nova][Chaos Nova] is stunned for an additional 2 sec.

name: Demonic Resilience
description: $?c2[Demon Spikes][Blur] gains 1 additional $Lcharge:charges;.

name: Burn It Out
description: $?c3[Soul Immolation][Immolation Aura] removes 1 Disease $Leffect:effects;.

name: Furious
description: Attacks and abilities that generate Fury deal 3% increased damage.

name: Remorseless
description: Attacks and abilities that spend Fury deal 3% increased damage.

name: Demon Muzzle
description: Interrupting a spell with Disrupt decreases your magic damage taken by -15% for 12 sec.

name: Soul Splitter
description: Any time you would generate one or more Soul Fragments, you have a 2% chance to generate an additional Soul Fragment.

name: Wings of Wrath
description: Glide speed increased by 10%.

name: Soul Cleanse
description: $?c3[Soul Immolation][Immolation Aura] removes 1 Curse $Leffect:effects;.

name: First In, Last Out
description: $?a212612[Fel Rush]?a212613[Infernal Strike][Shift] grants you a rapidly decaying shield equal to 6% of your maximum health.

name: Final Breath
description: Fully channeling $?a212612[Eye Beam]?a212613[Fel Devastation][Void Ray] increases the damage of its final tick by 300%.

name: Demon Muzzle
description: Interrupting a spell with Disrupt decreases your magic damage taken by -15% for 12 sec.

name: Felbound
description: Your movement speed is increased by 3%.

name: Untethered Rage
description: Soul Cleave and Spirit Bomb have a chance per soul fragment consumed to grant Untethered Rage, allowing Metamorphosis to be cast without incurring its cooldown and lasting 10 sec.

name: Untethered Rage
description: Soul Cleave and Spirit Bomb can consume an additional soul fragment and deal an additional 5% damage for each consumed.

name: Untethered Rage
description: Each cast of Soul Cleave and Spirit Bomb that does not grant Untethered Rage instead applies a stack of Seething Anger. Seething Anger grants 1% Agility and increases your chance to gain Untethered Rage. Lasts 12 sec and cannot be refreshed after gaining Untethered Rage.

name: Seething Anger
description: Each cast of Soul Cleave and Spirit Bomb that does not grant Untethered Rage instead applies a stack of Seething Anger. Seething Anger grants 1% Agility and increases your chance to gain Untethered Rage. Lasts 12 sec and cannot be refreshed after gaining Untethered Rage.

name: Keen Edge
description: Reaver's Glaive damage is increased by 20% and other Physical-only damage is increased by 10%.

name: Broken Spirit
description: Sigil of Spite shatters 1 additional Soul $LFragment:Fragments;. Soul Cleave has a 20% chance to shatter a Soul Fragment.

name: Bladecraft
description: Fury of the Aldrachi further empowers Soul Cleave when cast after Fracture, increasing slashes to 12. Reaver's Mark now stacks up to $442624u times and further empowers Fracture when cast after Soul Cleave, applying an additional stack.

name: Soulforged Blades
description: Hungering Slash and Voidblade's critical strike chance is increased by 15%.

name: Singular Strikes
description: Voidblade damage increased by 25%. Hungering Slash deals 50% increased damage to its primary target.

name: Explosion of the Soul
description: Fracture has a 0% chance to spark a violent detonation, causing 0 Fire damage onto nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond $s2 targets.

name: Consume Magic
description: Consume $m1 beneficial Magic effect removing it from the target and granting you 20 Fury.

name: Harness the Cosmos
description: Voidfall Meteor damage increased by 15%.
